metadata.title: CVE-2019-10054 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Suricata 4.1.3. The function process_reply_record_v3 lacks a check for the length of reply.data. It causes an invalid memory access and the program crashes within the nfs/nfs3.rs file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-10054` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

suricata - 1:4.1.4-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: suricata package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:4.1.4-1').
